column1: pdf printable version visiting hours. friday june 26, 2015, 5:00 p. m. - 8:00 p. m. at hobbs funeral home funeral service. saturday june 27, 2015, 10:00 a. m. at state street church facts. born: july 5, 1922. place of birth: cape elizabeth, maine. death: june 19, 2015. place of death: scarborough, maine. organizations: cape elizabeth garden club; cape elizabeth historical society; portland college club memorial donations. memorial donations can be made to: the cure alzheimer's fund, 34 washington street # 300, wellesley hills, ma 02481. memorial networks partner provider: batesville interactive, all rights reserved. funeral home website by batesville, inc. privacy terms of use
